fields.name: template
fields.title: Process Template
fields.description: The business process template associated with this item.

fields.name: metadata
fields.title: Data
fields.description: Metadata associated with the process. Normally a JSON formatted object which contains the input data of this business process instance.

fields.name: executionDate
fields.title: Execution Date
fields.description: The date and time when this will be executed.

fields.name: lastExecutionTime
fields.title: Last Execution Time
fields.description: The date and time when this process was last executed.

fields.name: badExecutionCount
fields.title: Bad Executions
fields.description: The number of times the process failed to complete.

fields.name: source
fields.title: Source
fields.description: The XML source associated with this business process. This XML source is going to be used for process persistency.
